alert.note: Alert for Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 8:27PM EST until March 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Spring Valley. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water rises into low-lying areas close to the river near Spring Valley, Roxanna and east of Waynesville. Water floods Corwin Road, as well as Waynesville and Middletown Roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
